attributes.action: stop referring to Britain as a 'multi-cultural society'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently only 8% of the United Kingdom's population is of an ethnic minority yet still this seemingly small percentage has led to Britain be deemed a 'multi-cultural society'.  It does not seem right that such a small change in Britain’s make up can lead to our country’s homogeneity being taken away, a feature of our society which makes us all one united body, and instead replace it with a term which discourages both community cohesion and promotes negative diversity.
